testcase.name: Login Page › should display login form
Login Page › should navigate to register page when clicking sign up link
Login Page › should show error for invalid credentials
Login Page › should successfully login with valid credentials
Login Page › should successfully login as operator
Register Page › should display registration form
Register Page › should navigate to login page when clicking sign in link
Register Page › should show password requirements hint
Register Page › should successfully register with valid data
Register Page › should successfully register as operator
Register Page › should show error when email already exists
Register Page › should register with Spanish base language
Header Navigation › should display user email in header after login
Header Navigation › should show learner navigation links for learner
Header Navigation › should show operator navigation links for operator
Header Navigation › should logout and redirect to login page
Header Navigation › should show user role in dropdown menu
Protected Routes › should redirect to login when accessing protected route without auth
Protected Routes › should access dashboard after login
Protected Routes › should show 403 when learner tries to access operator route
Protected Routes › should allow operator to access operator routes
Operator Dashboard › should deny access to learner
Operator Dashboard › should allow operator to access dashboard
Operator Dashboard › should display header navigation for operator
Operator Dashboard › should display sidebar for operator
Review Queue › should deny access to learner
Review Queue › should allow operator to access review queue
Review Queue › should display content type filter
Review Queue › should display table headers
Review Queue › should display sidebar navigation
